title: Chic Salad
typeOfFood: Lacto, Raw, Salad bar, Delivery, Take-out, Bakery, Catering, French, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A salad bar restaurant with vegan choices. Opened Nov. 2015. Has an open kitchen with seats at the bar and a few tables. Simple and clean design, a welcoming place. Recipes come from France and are adapted to the lifestyle of the city. Very little meat is served and consists of fish and chicken only. You can replace cheese with tofu.
